Body:
Windows 10
JDK version 8.0.45

I downloaded and installed the WSO2 IoT 3.0.0.

I followed steps here to run servers:
docs.wso2.com/display/IoTS300/Running+the+Product#995f288dd90d4800a671282c23a2cb68

(installed plugins ok)
run broker ok
run core ok
run analytics error:

JAVA_HOME environment variable is set to c:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_45 CARBON_HOME environment variable is set to C:\Softver\WSO2\WSO2IO~1.0\ANALYT~1\bin\.. Body:
WSO2 IoT 3.1.0 is released and it has fixed many issues. Can you please try running the new WSO2 IoT 3.1.0?

"
